price: 96. Мре tosilaki solo kotinda Müssa na makamwisi ma biso na bokonzi bwa polele,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
